column5: I just got my new Musky Hunter mag in thr mail and an ad for Cortland Master Braid caught my eye.  I use power pro, 80lb on my Musky Gear, and 30 and 40 on my bass gear.  But this stuff has a sweet looking brown colour and of course promises to be the best braid ever using some new patented technology.  Any thoughs or opinions?
It's great stuff, I've been using it on a few reels for about 4 years now, and it's still going strong.  It is good braid.  Aaron
